snippet.title: Álom - Trailer
snippet.description:
You're a boy named Alek, living by himself in his own room. What are Alek's reasons for that? Explore his dreams, collect memories and effects (some cosmetic/some that change gameplay) to discover his backstory.
As of now, trailer made in demo v.1.1, expect changes.

https://pixelnovak.itch.io/alom
https://instagram.com/alom_game

Graphics/Programming by PixelNovak, from Brazil.
My instagram: https://instagram.com/pixelnovak

Songs composed/arranged by André Luiz/Astrophysics, composer from Brazil.
Astrophysics's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWSC_-y9QsDmACXRY3rvtsQ

Main Theme composed by Yury Luhautsou from Nürnberg band, Minsk, Belarus.
Nürnberg's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtalx9o8x1qOzkk4_76DCdQ
@nurnbergband
